select
from zone where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and archive = false

select
from zone where parent_id = 0 and archive = false

select
from zone where parent_id = #{0} and archive = false

select
from zone where path = (select path from zone where id = #{0}) and archive = false

SELECT T2.id,T2.name,T2.zip_code,T2.path,T2.parent_id,T2.creator_id,T2.archive,T2.created_at,T2.updated_at FROM ( SELECT @r AS _id, (SELECT @r := parent_id FROM zone WHERE id = _id) AS parent_id, @l := @l + 1 AS lvl FROM (SELECT @r := #{0}, @l := 0) vars, zone h WHERE @r <> 0) T1 JOIN zone T2 ON T1._id = T2.id where T2.archive=false ORDER BY T1.lvl DESC
